name: Circular Charlie
notes: Probability is a ratio of x:y. This is an easy problem that can be solved by using combination to count x and count y.

name: Colorful Cube
notes: The easiest way to compute this is to calculate the total number of ways to invite people and then remove those that invite both.

name: Modified Deck Pair
notes: Count the ways you can get a pair and divide that by all the number of ways the remaining cards can be arranged.
